data: PREVENT-IA is for companies and workers involved in high-risk occupations such as logistics, commissioning, transport, and assembly. This AI-powered education platform addresses the critical need to reduce workplace accidents, facilitating access to comprehensive on-site Occupational Risk Prevention (ORP) training. Unlike traditional methods that are often cumbersome and static, PREVENT-IA offers dynamic and personalized training modules, real-time support through chat, and robust tracking and reporting features. By leveraging cutting-edge AI and cloud technologies, our platform ensures continuous learning improvement, making it far superior to static, one-size-fits-all training programs. This way, PREVENT-IA not only enhances safety but also streamlines the entire ORP training process, providing a measurable impact on accident reduction and regulatory compliance.
